name: Paul's World
description:
Paul's World is an Old-School RPG game. We designed this game for mini rpg & survival fans. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing, mini games and more, just explore it!
Monsters, wild animals, aliens... Who do you think will win?

Features

  • Mini RPG Survival game!
  • You can loot items!
  • Manage the basic farm system!
  • Buy new weapons and armors!
  • Fight with enemies and monsters!
  • You can fish!
  • You can cook!
  • You can be a miner!
  • Turn Based Combat System!
  • New mini games!



Explore the forest, discover secret places...
